Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute at Cermak/Archer
ShortDescription: 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Archer, Canal and Cermak due to, street blockage near Cermak/Archer.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Archer, Canal and Cermak due to, street blockage near Cermak/Archer.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #90 Harlem Temporary Reroute at Harlem/Addison
ShortDescription: 90 Harlem buses are rerouted in both directions via Harlem, Addison, Oak Park, Belmont, Harlem, due to fire department activity near Harlem/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Harlem, Addison, Oak Park, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Harlem, due to fire department activity near Harlem/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Belmont/Francisco
ShortDescription: Eastbound 77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Sacramento, Elston and Belmont due to, street blockage near Belmont/Francisco.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this effect my trip:

Eastbound #77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Sacramento, Elston and Belmont due to, street blockage near Belmont/Francisco.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
